overview.description: WyneOS is an enterprise framework engineered to provide governance, telemetry, integrity enforcement, predictive modelling, and controlled emergent behaviour.
overview.purpose: Support WFSL, SAS-CIC, and partner systems with a stable and extensible operational backbone.
overview.architectureStyle: Modular, phased architecture with sealed integrity layers and governance control points.

coreCapabilities.governance: Provides centralised policy evaluation and enforcement.
coreCapabilities.integrity: Ensures critical files and manifests remain unchanged.
coreCapabilities.telemetry: Delivers heartbeat, sync tracking, and integrity status.
coreCapabilities.optimisation: Improves system performance based on real data.
coreCapabilities.analysis: Identifies patterns and supports decision making.
coreCapabilities.emergentBehaviour: Produces controlled higher order behaviour via Phase 9 processes.
coreCapabilities.audit: Preserves a full evidential chain for compliance.

operationalModel.runtime: Includes controlled Node and PowerShell runtimes.
operationalModel.manifestsAndSeals: All phases sealed with verifiable manifests.
operationalModel.registry: Unified registry defines identity, capabilities, versioning, and health requirements.
operationalModel.governanceModel: Phase 7 governance defines all permitted system actions.

deploymentScope.partner: Permitted for integration testing with approved partners.
deploymentScope.public: Not available for open public release in version 1.0.

strategicPosition.value: Provides a foundational enterprise operating layer for future WFSL and SAS-CIC systems.
strategicPosition.growthPath: Designed to support future API layers, distributed governance, and intelligent service orchestration.
strategicPosition.readiness: Stable and prepared for expansion in version 1.x.
